resources.string: This application takes a picture using the front facing camera and saves the image to the device.

These several sources provided instruction and inspiration to achieve the functionally displayed in this application.

 Create the camera preview in the surfaceview variable.
 http://www.java2s.com/Code/Android/Hardware/Camerapreview.htm

 Return optimal resolution for camera in surfaceview.
 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/19577299/android-camera-preview-stretched

 Retrieve an imageview from a file
 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4181774/show-image-view-from-file-path-in-android

 Rotate a bitmap 90 degrees
 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/9015372/how-to-rotate-a-bitmap-90-degrees

 Set a bitmap to imageview.
 http://stackoverflow.com/questions/8306623/get-bitmap-attached-to-imageview
